description: Positive numbers n with property that all pairs of consecutive base 10 digits differ by 0 or 1.
comments: a(n) = A178403(n+1) for n < 38. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, May 27 2010
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
prog: (Haskell)a032981 n = a032981_list !! (n-1)a032981_list = map read $ filter f $ map show [1..] :: [Int] where   f ps = all (`elem` neighbours) $ zipWith ((. return) . (:)) ps (tail ps)   neighbours = "09" : "90" : zipWith ((. return) . (:))      (digs ++ tail digs ++ init digs) (digs ++ init digs ++ tail digs)   digs = "0123456789"-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 14 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
